verbose_text: Inhibition of COX-2 reversed the Raptor deficiency induced increase in protein and mRNA (XREF_FIG) levels of UCP1 in iWAT but had little effect on thermogenic gene expression in BAT (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY), suggesting that COX-2 mediates the inducing effect of Raptor deficiency on the browning of WAT.
evidence: COX-2 reversed the Raptor deficiency-induced increase in protein                                               and mRNA ( XREF_FIG ) levels of UCP1 in iWAT but had little effect on thermogenic gene expression in BAT ( XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY ), suggesting that COX-2 mediates the inducing effect of Raptor deficiency on the browning of WAT
